name: pokertools-v2
description: A web app providing tools useful to pokers players

scripts.install-all: cd front-end && npm install && cd ../back-end && npm install
scripts.migrate-init: cd back-end && npx knex migrate:make init --migrations-directory src/database/migrations -x ts
scripts.migrate-up: cd back-end && npx knex migrate:up --knexfile src/database/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate-down: cd back-end && npx knex migrate:down --knexfile src/database/knexfile.ts

author: Tahreak Robinson
